trans-unit.source: Represents the post-schema-validation infoset of a validated XML node.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaInfo"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaContentType"></xref> object that corresponds to the content type of this validated XML node.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaContentType"></xref> object.
Gets or sets a value indicating if this validated XML node was set as the result of a default being applied during XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation.
The IsDefault property does not report DTD defaults.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref> value.
Gets or sets a value indicating if the value for this validated XML node is nil.
The value of an XML node is nil if its `xsi:nil` attribute is `true`.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_bool" name="bool" href=""></xref> value.
Gets or sets the dynamic schema type for this validated XML node.
The MemberType property is set only if the static type of the XML node is a union type in which case the MemberType property will return the type from the union the XML node validated against.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSimpleType"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the compiled <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref> object that corresponds to this validated XML node.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAttribute"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the compiled <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> object that corresponds to this validated XML node.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaElement"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the static XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema type of this validated XML node.
The static type of an XML node is the type that was declared in the XSD schema.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaType"></xref> object.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity"></xref> value of this validated XML node.

The possible <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity> values for this XML node are <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>, and <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidity"></xref> value.
